title: Pun Type Poster Competition
content:
I know you’ve all have been itching for a chance to get back at Chris Lozos after his shameless scare tactic posters series, right? Right?

Well, here’s your chance, ladies and gentlemen. Though I have to admit that mine, being hastily made at 12:30 am, neither have the proper visual substance nor word/sentence pun.

You know, actually this topic would be a nice chance to get a visual overview of the many faces that we all made, completed or not.

Of course you are welcome, too, Chris. I was just kidding :)

Allright, let’s get grilling.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071016222950im_/http:/typophile.com/files/glasses_5125.png)

 [‹ Any suggestions for books on brush calligraphy?](http://web.archive.org/web/20071016222950/http:/typophile.com/node/29356 "Go to previous forum topic") [COOL typography websites ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071016222950/http:/typophile.com/node/531 "Go to next forum topic")
author: brampitoyo

comments.content: Hmmm... that didn’t go over too well.
Dude, I know. Don’t we love making specimens, people?
